reason: The confluence of major financial institutions (Franklin Templeton, Spark) bridging with crypto, significant regulatory clarity in a key financial hub (Hong Kong allowing perpetuals), and the accelerating Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization trend are powerful catalysts pushing the market into a robust Markup phase. These developments signal increasing institutional adoption, enhanced liquidity, and expansion of crypto's utility. While the long-term outlook is bullish, the introduction of more sophisticated financial products like perpetuals and the 'boom' in RWAs can lead to heightened volatility and speculative interest in the short-to-medium term, necessitating a vigilant 'WATCH' stance.
headlines: Binance teams up with Franklin Templeton to use tokenized money market funds as off-exchange collateral
Spark looks to build building a safe bridge between onchain capital and TradFi
Hong Kong working to allow perpetual contracts, chief regulator says
Institutions fuel tokenized RWA boom as retail looks set to follow suit
Solana's Lily Liu champions internet capital markets at Consensus Hong Kong 2026
